resources.string:
What is Lorem Ipsum? 

 Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book.


 It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged.

College Of Natural And Applied Science
\n\n The College of Natural and Applied Sciences houses three Major academic departments namely, Biological Sciences
\n\n
(BIOSC), Chemical,
Food and Nutrition (CFNSC) and Computer Science and Information Technology(CSCIT).

College of Engineering
\n\n
The College of Engineering houses two Major academic departments namely, Mechanical and Biomedical Engineering \n\n
and Electrical Electronics
and Computer Engineering Departments.

College Of Management Sciences



The College of Management Sciences houses three Major academic departments namely, Economics, 

 Accounting and Finance (EAFNB), Business Administration (BUSAD) and Management Technology(MGTCH).

College Of Environmental Science 


The College of Environmental Sciences houses seven Major academic departments namely,
Civil and Environmental Engineering, Architecture, 

 Building Engineering, Estate Management,
Surveying and GeoInformatics, Quantity Surveying and Urban and Regional Planning Departments.
